CustomField.formula: "Planning Comments:"& BR() & "- If the replacement set of equipment differs from the original, ie: DG/TG instead of DG, planning must notify the account manager prior to ordering"& BR() & "- Where possible all NIS DG jobs are to be designed NIS DG-TG with Triple Gob Quantities. This applies to both new and Replacement Equipment"& BR() & "- If the annual volume for the container does not warrant Triple Gob Quantities then planning are to advise that only DG Quantities should be purchased"& BR() & BR() & "Mould Shop / Design Comments:"& BR() & "- If moulds are paid for by the customer, then an order will only be placed after approval has been received from the customer"& BR() & "- Mould order will only be placed if the customer's approval is attached to this form"
CustomField.label: MPA Notes
